Title: The Silencing Properties of Snow
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), Robia Rashid, Dennis Saldua (executive story editor), Ava Tramer (story editor), Michael Oppenhuizen (staff writer), Jen Regan (staff writer)
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Keir Gilchrist, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: After a disastrous dinner with Paige's family, Sam makes amends at the school dance. Casey's fury at her mom affects her relationship with Evan.
